DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study well understand health , include lung health , Veterans deploy support Operation Enduring Freedom ( OEF ) , Operation Iraqi Freedom ( OIF ) , Operation New Dawn ( OND ) deployments follow Operations .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study characterize impact deployment-related pollution exposures Post-9/11 Gulf War Era current respiratory health use objectively ascertain standardize physiologic epidemiologic measure . The primary objective support aim ass association cumulative exposure PM2.5 deployments U.S. base location Central Asia ( Afghanistan Kyrgyzstan ) , Southwest Asia ( Iraq , Kuwait , Qatar , United Arab Emirates ) Africa ( Djibouti ) current measure pulmonary function . Secondary objective support aim examine association cumulative exposure PM2.5 deployments clinical outcome medically-treated asthma . The investigator also explore impact deployment duration pulmonary function asthma . This study execute 4 distinct effort meet study objective : ( 1 ) enroll study cohort 6,200 Veterans live within catchment area 6 VA recruitment site , conduct in-person assessment pulmonary function , collect data key covariates ; ( 2 ) create spatial-temporal exposure grid environmental PM2.5 level average per week per 1 square kilometer location military personnel serve ; ( 3 ) link individual 's location duration ( spatial-temporal ) history deploy non-deployed time average PM exposure time period ; ( 4 ) conduct association analyse test hypotheses deployment-related cumulative PM2.5 exposure current respiratory health combine exposure data data collect cohort member military record .
DOC.criteria: Served Post9/11 Gulf War Era service branch landbased deployment ( Air Force , Army , Marine Corps ) Deployed Afghanistan , Kyrgyzstan , Iraq , Kuwait , Qatar , United Arab Emirates , Djibouti October 1 , 2001 Active duty time recruitment Impaired decision make capacity No English language proficiency Prisoners
